ModMetaData.name: Mods Compatibility Patch by Emty
ModMetaData.author: Emty
ModMetaData.description:
Mods Compatibility Patch
=====
Common: - More mineable steel for modpacks - More trades ships - Nerf leather human market price - Craftable reinforced barrel - Disable visual effect in Archotech Structure Studiable - Disable tribes raids in end game - Wind turbine smaller size - Rottable BodyPartNatural
=====
VGP: - Disable basic cook meals. Only from VGP. - Fix meals ingredients - Make sushi with fish from Vanilla Fishing Expanded, Biomes! Islands, FishIndustry - Humanoid Alien Races MixingIngredients bug fix (https://github.com/erdelf/AlienRaces/issues/70)
=====
Eccentric Tech: - Craftable AI Computer Core - Research ship needs Aurora Core - Add Angel Apparel to traders
=====
SeedsPlease: - More seeds in traders caravans
=====
Nyaron race: - Add man gender to Nyaron - Fix correct names - Adds Nyaron to common factions with balance fix
=====
Ancient Species: - Adds Elves to common factions with balance fix - Remove Neolithic and Medieval Factions - Wearable lances - Fix apparels temperature and armor
=====
RimFridge: - All fridges is movable
=====
Expanded Prosthetics and Organ Engineering: - Bugfix BasicProsthesis craftable on TableMachining
=====
Cybernetic Organism and Neural Network: - Disable visual passive effects
=====
MendAndRecycle: - Market price 4 silver for MendingKit, because in default is too much market value then sell it
=====
Biomes! Islands - More islands clusters
=====
PsiTech: - Easy research
